**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog

## Description

Dark hero with CTAs and trust logos - Ref: 01-hero-dark.png

patterns.styling: Uses MUI's styled() API from @mui/material/styles, NOT Emotion directly
patterns.component_structure: Single .tsx files with inline styled components (not separate .styles.ts files)
patterns.responsive: Uses MUI breakpoints with sx prop and useMediaQuery hook
patterns.buttons: Custom Button components from ./ui/Button with variant props

existing_implementations.description: Found existing landing page components (CTASection, FeaturesBentoGrid) that follow MUI + styled() pattern
